meanings.definition: The quality of acting or done quickly and without thought or care.
meanings.sent1: Her impetuousness led her to make hasty decisions without considering the consequences.
meanings.sent2: His impetuousness often resulted in him regretting his actions later.
meanings.sent3: The impetuousness of the squirrel darting across the road made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The impetuousness of the storm caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The impetuousness of the child running into the street was a heart-stopping moment for the onlookers.

meanings.definition: The tendency to act on impulse.
meanings.sent1: She couldn't control her impetuousness and bought the dress without thinking.
meanings.sent2: His impetuousness often led to spontaneous adventures.
meanings.sent3: The impetuousness of the puppy chasing its tail was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The impetuousness of the river rushing downstream mirrored his own impulsive nature.
meanings.sent5: The impetuousness of the decision to quit his job changed his life forever.
